title: How have your hobbies changed over time? Compare past and present.

korean: 최근에 소설책 한 권 읽기 시작했는데, 진짜 오랜만이야.
요즘 핸드폰만 보느라 책 읽을 시간이 없었거든.
서점 갔다가 베스트셀러 코너에서 눈에 띄는 책 하나 샀어.
표지 디자인이 예뻐서 끌렸는데, 내용도 괜찮더라고.
첫 장부터 몰입이 돼서 계속 읽게 되더라.
주인공 이야기가 공감 가는 부분이 많아서 재미있어.
잠들기 전에 30분 정도 읽는 게 요즘 루틴이야.
핸드폰 보다가 자면 눈이 피곤한데, 책 읽으니까 더 편안해.
가끔 밑줄 그으면서 읽는데, 좋은 문장들이 많아.
책 읽으면서 생각도 많아지고 감성도 풍부해지는 것 같아.
절반 정도 읽었는데, 결말이 어떻게 될지 궁금해.
다 읽고 나면 다른 책도 찾아봐야지, 독서 습관 들이고 싶어.
english: So i recently started reading a novel, and it's been a really long time.
I've been looking at my phone so much lately that I had no time to read.
So i went to a bookstore and bought a book that caught my eye in the bestseller section.
I was drawn to it because the cover, I mean, design was pretty, and the content was good too.
I got immersed from the first page and kept reading.
The main character's story has a, you know, lot of relatable parts, so it's interesting.
Reading for about 30 minutes before, you know, bed has become my routine these days.
My eyes get tired when I look at my phone before sleeping, but reading a book , like, is more comfortable.
Sometimes I underline while reading,, you know, and there are many good sentences.
Reading makes me think more and feel like my emotions are becoming richer.
I've read about half of it, and I'm curious how it will end.
After I finish, I should look for another, you know, book, I want to build a reading habit.
